TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Paragraphs implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 所选内容、范围或文档中的对象的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects in a selection, range, or document.

para.span: 使用 段落 属性返回 的段落 集合。

span.span: Use the Paragraphs property to return the Paragraphs collection.

para.span: 使用 、、 或 方法可向文档中添加一个新段落。

span.span: Use the , , , or method to add a new paragraph to a document.

para.span: 使用段落（ ），其中 是索引号，返回单个段落对象。

span.span: Use Paragraphs(), where is the index number, to return a single Paragraph object.

para.span: 在文档中，此集合的属性返回的只是正文中的项目数。

span.span: The property for this collection in a document returns the number of items in the main story only.

para.span: 若要统计其他部分中的项目数，请使用带有该对象的集合 。

span.span: To count items in other stories use the collection with the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Paragraph Add([in]object& Range) runtime managed
Public Function Add (Optional ByRef Range As Object) As Paragraph

param.name: Range

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要在其前添加新段落的区域。

span.span: The range before which you want the new paragraph to be added.

param.span: 新的段落不替换该区域。

span.span: The new paragraph doesn't replace the range.

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象代表添加到文档中的一个新的空白段落。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a new, blank paragraph added to a document.

para.span: 如果 未指定，则将新段落添加到所选内容或范围之后或文档末尾。

span.span: If isn't specified, the new paragraph is added after the selection or range or at the end of the document.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AddSpaceBetweenFarEastAndAlpha { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.AddSpaceBetweenFarEastAndAlpha : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定是否将 Microsoft Word 设置为在指定段落的日语和西文文字之间自动添加空格。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word is set to automatically add spaces between Japanese and Latin text for the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 如果 Word 设置为在指定段落中的日文和西文文字之间自动添加空格，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word is set to automatically add spaces between Japanese and Latin text for the specified paragraphs, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果只对某些指定段落设置为True ，则此属性将返回wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if it’s set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AddSpaceBetweenFarEastAndDigit { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.AddSpaceBetweenFarEastAndDigit : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定是否将 Microsoft Word 设置为在日语文本和数字之间为指定段落自动添加空格。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word is set to automatically add spaces between Japanese text and numbers for the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 如果 Word 设置为在指定段落的日语文本和数字之间自动添加空格，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word is set to automatically add spaces between Japanese text and numbers for the specified paragraphs, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果只对某些指定段落设置为True ，则此属性将返回wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if it’s set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

span.span: Returns or sets a constant that represents the alignment for the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 由于您选择或安装的语言支持不同（例如美国英语），上述部分常量可能无法使用。

span.span: Some of the constants listed above may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you’ve selected or installed.

member this.AutoAdjustRightIndent : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定是否将 Microsoft Word 设置为自动调整指定段落的右缩进（如果已指定每行的字符数）。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word is set to automatically adjust the right indent for the specified paragraphs if you’ve specified a set number of characters per line.

para.span: 如果将 Word 设置为自动调整指定段落的右缩进（如果您指定了每行的字符数），则此属性返回True ; 如果您指定了设置的每行字符数，则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word is set to automatically adjust the right indent for the specified paragraphs if you’ve specified a set number of characters per line, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果仅有某些指定段落的AutoAdjustRightIndent属性设置为True ，则此属性返回wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if the AutoAdjustRightIndent property is set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

para.span: 如果指定的对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的，则此属性返回十六进制数字是4d535744，表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: [!注释] 此值还可以通过常量 wdCreatorCode 表示。

span.span: This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

para.span: Creator属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上使用，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

member this.DisableLineHeightGrid : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定在指定每页的行数时，Microsoft Word 是否将指定段落中的字符与行网格对齐。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word aligns characters in the specified paragraphs to the line grid when a set number of lines per page is specified.

para.span: 如果指定的段落中的字符数为每页的行数，则此属性返回True ; 如果指定每页的行数，则此属性返回 False; 否则，将返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word aligns characters in the specified paragraphs to the line grid when a set number of lines per page is specified, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果仅有某些指定段落的 DisableLineHeightGrid 属性设置为 True ，则返回 wdUndefined 。

span.span: Returns wdUndefined if the DisableLineHeightGrid property is set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 如果 Word 将东亚语言的换行规则应用于指定段落，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word applies East Asian line-breaking rules to the specified paragraphs, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果仅有某些指定段落的FarEastLineBreakControl属性设置为True ，则此属性返回wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if the FarEastLineBreakControl property is set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

summary.span: 为一个或多个段落增加一个级别的缩进。

span.span: Indents one or more paragraphs by one level.

span.span: Using this method is equivalent to clicking the Increase Indent button on the Formatting toolbar.

summary.span: 确定当 Microsoft Word 对文档重新分页时，指定段落中的所有行是否保持在同一页上。

span.span: Determines if all lines in the specified paragraphs remain on the same page when Microsoft Word repaginates the document.

para.span: 如果指定段落中的所有行在 Word 对文档重新分页时保持在同一页上，则此属性返回True ; 如果不是，则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if all lines in the specified paragraphs remain on the same page when Word repaginates the document, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 可能的值为True、 False和wdUndefined。

span.span: Possible values are True, False, and wdUndefined.

span.span: Determines if the specified paragraph remains on the same page as the paragraph that follows it when Microsoft Word repaginates the document.

para.span: 如果指定的段落保留在 Microsoft Word 对文档重新分页时遵循的段落，则此属性返回True ; 如果不是，则返回False 。

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 可能的值为True、 False或wdUndefined。

span.span: Possible values are True, False, or wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float LineSpacing { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.LineSpacing : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落的行距 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the line spacing (in points) for the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 在LineSpacing 属性设置为以下项之后，可以设置 LineSpacing 属性：

span.span: The LineSpacing property can be set after the property has been set to the following:

para.span: wdLineSpaceAtLeast -行距可以大于或等于指定的LineSpacing值，但不得小于该指定的值。

span.span: wdLineSpaceAtLeast - The line spacing can be greater than or equal to, but never less than, the specified LineSpacing value.

para.span: wdLineSpaceExactly -线条间距永远不会从指定的LineSpacing值更改，即使段落中使用了较大的字体也是如此。

span.span: wdLineSpaceExactly - The line spacing never changes from the specified LineSpacing value, even if a larger font is used within the paragraph.

para.span: wdlinespacemultiplelinespacing -必须指定LineSpacing属性值，以磅为单位。

span.span: wdLineSpaceMultiple - A LineSpacing property value must be specified, in points.

para.span: 使用 方法可将行数转换为相应的值（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Use the method to convert a number of lines to the corresponding value in points.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLineSpacing LineSpacingRule { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLineSpacing get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdLineSpacing value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落的行距。

span.span: Returns or sets the line spacing for the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 可以是下列常量之一：

span.span: can be one of the following constants:

para.span: 使用 wdLineSpaceSingle 、 wdLineSpace1pt5 或 wdLineSpaceDouble 将行间距设置为下列值之一。

span.span: Use wdLineSpaceSingle, wdLineSpace1pt5, or wdLineSpaceDouble to set the line spacing to one of these values.

para.span: 若要将行距设置为确切的磅数或多行数，还必须设置 属性。

span.span: To set the line spacing to an exact number of points or to a multiple number of lines, you must also set the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OpenOrCloseUp() runtime managed

summary.span: 如果指定段落的段前间距等于 0（零），则此方法将其设置为 12 磅；如果指定段落的段前间距大于 0（零），则此方法将其设置为 0（零）。

span.span: If spacing before the specified paragraphs is 0 (zero), this method sets spacing to 12 points. If spacing before the paragraphs is greater than 0 (zero), this method sets spacing to 0 (zero).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OpenUp() runtime managed

summary.span: 为指定段落设置 12 磅的段前间距。

span.span: Sets spacing before the specified paragraphs to 12 points.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Outdent() runtime managed

summary.span: 为一个或多个段落删除一个级别的缩进。

span.span: Removes one level of indent for one or more paragraphs.

para.span: 使用此方法等效于单击 "格式" 工具栏上的 "减少缩进量" 按钮。

span.span: Using this method is equivalent to clicking the Decrease Indent button on the Formatting toolbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OutlineDemote() runtime managed

summary.span: 对指定段落应用下一个标题级别样式（从"标题 1"到"标题 8"）。

span.span: Applies the next heading level style (Heading 1 through Heading 8) to the specified paragraph or paragraphs.

para.span: 如果一个段落的样式为"标题 2"，则此方法将该段落的标题样式降级到"标题 3"。

span.span: If a paragraph is formatted with the Heading 2 style, this method demotes the paragraph by changing the style to Heading 3.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OutlineDemoteToBody() runtime managed

summary.span: 通过应用"正文"样式将指定段落降级为正文文本。

span.span: Demotes the specified paragraph or paragraphs to body text by applying the Normal style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOutlineLevel OutlineLevel { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOutlineLevel get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdOutlineLevel value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落的大纲级别。

span.span: Returns or sets the outline level for the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 返回的 vale 可以是下列 常量之一：

span.span: The return vale can be one of the following constants:

para.span: 如果段落应用了一种标题样式（从"标题 1"到"标题 9"），则大纲级别与该标题样式相同，并且不能更改。

span.span: If a paragraph has a heading style applied to it (Heading 1 through Heading 9), the outline level is the same as the heading style and cannot be changed.

para.span: 大纲级别仅在大纲视图或文档结构图窗格中可见。

span.span: Outline levels are visible only in outline view or the document map pane.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OutlinePromote() runtime managed

summary.span: 对指定段落应用上一个标题级别样式（从"标题 1"到"标题 8"）。

span.span: Applies the previous heading level style (Heading 1 through Heading 8) to the specified paragraph or paragraphs.

para.span: 如果一个段落的样式为"标题 2"，则此方法将该段落的样式升级到"标题 1"。

span.span: If a paragraph is formatted with the Heading 2 style, this method promotes the paragraph by changing the style to Heading 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int PageBreakBefore { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.PageBreakBefore : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定在指定段落前是否强制分页。

span.span: Determines if a page break is forced before the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 如果在指定段落之前强制分页，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if a page break is forced before the specified paragraphs, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 可能的返回值为True、 False和wdUndefined。

span.span: Possible return values are True, False, and wdUndefined.

summary.span: 返回一个对象，代表指定对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent object of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdReadingOrder ReadingOrder { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdReadingOrder get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::WdReadingOrder value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落的读取次序而不改变其对齐方式。

span.span: Returns or sets the reading order of the specified paragraphs without changing their alignment.

para.span: 可以是下列的WdReadingOrder常量之一：

span.span: can be one of the following WdReadingOrder constants:

para.span: 使用 、 、 和 方法更改段落的对齐方式和阅读顺序。

span.span: Use the , , , and methods to change the paragraph alignment along with the reading order.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reset() runtime managed

summary.span: 删除手动段落格式（不使用样式应用的格式）。

span.span: Removes manual paragraph formatting (formatting not applied using a style).

para.span: 如果手动右对齐段落并且基本样式为其他对齐方式，则用 Reset 方法将更改要匹配的基础样式的对齐方式。

span.span: If you manually right align a paragraph and the underlying style has a different alignment, the Reset method changes the alignment to match the formatting of the underlying style.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float RightIndent { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.RightIndent : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落的右缩进量（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets the right indent (in points) for the specified paragraphs.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Shading As Shading
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Shading ^ Shading { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::Shading ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 对象，该对象代表指定对象的底纹格式。

span.span: Returns a object that refers to the shading formatting for the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Space1() runtime managed

summary.span: 为指定段落设置单倍行距。

span.span: Single-spaces the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 精确间距取决于各段内最大字符的字号。

span.span: The exact spacing is determined by the font size of the largest characters in each paragraph.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Space15() runtime managed

summary.span: 为指定段落设置 1.5 倍行距。

span.span: Formats the specified paragraphs with 1.5-line spacing.

para.span: 精确间距为各段内最大字符的字号加上 6 磅。

span.span: The exact spacing is determined by adding 6 points to the font size of the largest character in each paragraph.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Space2() runtime managed

summary.span: 为指定段落设置 2 倍行距。

span.span: Double-spaces the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 精确间距为各段内最大字符的字号加上 12 磅。

span.span: The exact spacing is determined by adding 12 points to the font size of the largest character in each paragraph.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float SpaceAfter { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.SpaceAfter : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落或文本栏后面的间距 (以磅为单位) 的数量。

span.span: Returns or sets the amount of spacing (in points) after the specified paragraph or text column.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SpaceAfterAuto { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SpaceAfterAuto : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定是否 Microsoft Word 自动设置指定段落的段后间距。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word automatically sets the amount of spacing after the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 如果 Word 自动设置指定段落的段后间距，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word automatically sets the amount of spacing after the specified paragraphs, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果仅有某些指定段落将 SpaceAfterAuto 属性设置为 True ，则此属性返回 wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if the SpaceAfterAuto property is set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 当您打开不带级联样式表的 HTML 文档时，Word 会自动将SpaceAfterAuto属性设置为True ，以呈现与 Web 浏览器中显示的段落间距完全一样的段落间距。

span.span: When you open an HTML document without cascading style sheets, Word automatically sets the SpaceAfterAuto property to True to render the paragraph spacing exactly as it would appear in a Web browser.

para.span: 如果将SpaceAfterAuto设置为True，则 忽略该属性。

span.span: If SpaceAfterAuto is set to True, the property is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float SpaceBefore { float get(); void set(float value); };
member this.SpaceBefore : single with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定段落的段前间距 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets the spacing (in points) before the specified paragraphs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SpaceBeforeAuto { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SpaceBeforeAuto : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定是否 Microsoft Word 自动设置指定段落的段前间距。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word automatically sets the amount of spacing before the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 如果 Word 自动设置指定段落的段前间距，则此属性返回True ，否则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word automatically sets the amount of spacing before the specified paragraphs, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果仅有某些指定段落将 SpaceBeforeAuto 属性设置为 True ，则此属性返回 wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if the SpaceBeforeAuto property is set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs.

para.span: 当您打开不带级联样式表的 HTML 文档时，Word 会自动将SpaceBeforeAuto属性设置为True ，以呈现与 Web 浏览器中显示的段落间距完全一样的段落间距。

span.span: When you open an HTML document without cascading style sheets, Word automatically sets the SpaceBeforeAuto property to True to render the paragraph spacing exactly as it would appear in a Web browser.

para.span: 如果将SpaceBeforeAuto设置为True，则 忽略该属性。

span.span: If SpaceBeforeAuto is set to True, the property is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Style { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Style : obj with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象的样式。

span.span: Returns or sets the style for the specified object.

para.span: 若要设置该属性，请指定样式的本地名称、一个整数、一个 常量或一个代表样式的对象。

span.span: To set this property, specify the local name of the style, an integer, a constant, or an object that represents the style.

para.span: 如果返回包含多个样式的范围的样式，则只返回第一个字符样式或段落样式。

span.span: When you return the style for a range that includes more than one style, only the first character or paragraph style is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TabHangingIndent([in]int16 Count) runtime managed

param.name: Count

span.span: Required Short.

param.span: 如果为正，则表示要缩进的制表位数；如果为负，则表示要删除的缩进制表位数。

span.span: The number of tab stops to indent (if positive) or the number of tab stops to remove from the indent (if negative).

summary.span: 将悬挂缩进量设置为指定的制表位数。

span.span: Sets a hanging indent to a specified number of tab stops.

para.span: 如果值是负数，则可用于将制表位从悬挂缩进中删除 。

span.span: Can be used to remove tab stops from a hanging indent if the value of is a negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void TabIndent([in]int16 Count) runtime managed

param.name: Count

span.span: Required Short.

param.span: 如果为正，则表示要缩进的制表位数；如果为负，则表示要删除的缩进制表位数。

span.span: The number of tab stops to indent (if positive) or the number of tab stops to remove from the indent (if negative).

summary.span: 将指定段落的左缩进量设置为指定的制表位数。

span.span: Sets the left indent for the specified paragraphs to a specified number of tab stops.

para.span: 如果值是负数，则也可以使用删除缩进 。

span.span: Can also be used to remove the indent if the value of is a negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TabStops ^ TabStops { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TabStops ^ get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::TabStops ^ value); };
member this.TabStops : Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.TabStops with get, set

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 集合，该集合代表指定段落的所有自定义制表位。

span.span: Returns or sets a collection that represents all the custom tab stops for the specified paragraphs.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WidowControl { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.WidowControl : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定当 Microsoft Word 对文档重新分页时，指定段落中的第一行和最后一行是否与段落的其余部分保持一致。

span.span: Determines if the first and last lines in the specified paragraph remain on the same page as the rest of the paragraph when Microsoft Word repaginates the document.

para.span: 如果指定段落中的第一行和最后一行与 Word 对文档重新分页时保留在同一页上，则此属性返回True ; 如果不是，则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if the first and last lines in the specified paragraph remain on the same page as the rest of the paragraph when Word repaginates the document, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 可能的返回值为True、 False和wdUndefined。

span.span: Possible return values are True, False and wdUndefined.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int WordWrap { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.WordWrap : int with get, set

summary.span: 确定 Microsoft Word 是否将西文文本在指定段落或文本框架中的单词中间换行。

span.span: Determines if Microsoft Word wraps Latin text in the middle of a word in the specified paragraphs or text frames.

para.span: 如果 Word 在指定段落或文本框架中的单词中间换行，则此属性返回True ; 如果不是，则返回False 。

span.span: This property returns True if Word wraps Latin text in the middle of a word in the specified paragraphs or text frames, and False if not.

para.span: 将属性值设置为True或False可启用或禁用功能。

span.span: Set the property value to True or False to enable or disable the functionality.

para.span: 如果只对某些指定段落或文本框架设置为True ，则此属性将返回wdUndefined 。

span.span: This property returns wdUndefined if set to True for only some of the specified paragraphs or text frames.

para.span: 此用法可能对您不可用，具体取决于您选择或安装的语言支持（例如，美国英语）。

span.span: This usage may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you’ve selected or installed.
